verses.verse: A Prayer <WH8605> of the afflicted <WH6041>, when he is overwhelmed <WH5848> <WH8799>, and poureth out <WH8210> <WH8799> his complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>. Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my prayer <WH8605>, O YY <WH3068>, and let my cry <WH7775> come <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee.

Hide <WH5641> <WH8686> not thy face <WH6440> from me in the day <WH3117> when I am in trouble <WH6862>; incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241> unto me: in the day <WH3117> when I call <WH7121> <WH8799> answer <WH6030> <WH8798> me speedily <WH4118>.
For my days <WH3117> are consumed <WH3615> <WH8804> like smoke <WH6227>, and my bones <WH6106> are burned <WH2787> <WH8738> as an hearth <WH4168>.
My heart <WH3820> is smitten <WH5221> <WH8717>, and withered <WH3001> <WH8799> like grass <WH6212>; so that I forget <WH7911> <WH8804> to eat <WH398> <WH8800> my bread <WH3899>.
By reason of the voice <WH6963> of my groaning <WH585> my bones <WH6106> cleave <WH1692> <WH8804> to my skin <WH1320>.
I am like <WH1819> <WH8804> a pelican <WH6893> of the wilderness <WH4057>: I am like an owl <WH3563> of the desert <WH2723>.
I watch <WH8245> <WH8804>, and am as a sparrow <WH6833> alone <WH909> <WH8802> upon the house top <WH1406>.
Mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> reproach <WH2778> <WH8765> me all the day <WH3117>; and they that are mad <WH1984> <WH8781> against me are sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> against me.
For I have eaten <WH398> <WH8804> ashes <WH665> like bread <WH3899>, and mingled <WH4537> <WH8804> my drink <WH8249> with weeping <WH1065>,
Because <WH6440> of thine indignation <WH2195> and thy wrath <WH7110>: for thou hast lifted me up <WH5375> <WH8804>, and cast me down <WH7993> <WH8686>.
My days <WH3117> are like a shadow <WH6738> that declineth <WH5186> <WH8803>; and I am withered <WH3001> <WH8799> like grass <WH6212>.
But thou, O YY <WH3068>, shalt endure <WH3427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>; and thy remembrance <WH2143> unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
Thou shalt arise <WH6965> <WH8799>, and have mercy <WH7355> <WH8762> upon TZiyon <WH6726>: for the time <WH6256> to favour <WH2603> <WH8800> her, yea, the set time <WH4150>, is come <WH935> <WH8804>.
For thy servants <WH5650> take pleasure <WH7521> <WH8804> in her stones <WH68>, and favour <WH2603> <WH8779> the dust <WH6083> thereof.
So the heathen <WH1471> shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, and all the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> thy glory <WH3519>.
When the YY <WH3068> shall build up <WH1129> <WH8804> TZiyon <WH6726>, he shall appear <WH7200> <WH8738> in his glory <WH3519>.
He will regard <WH6437> <WH8804> the prayer <WH8605> of the destitute <WH6199>, and not despise <WH959> <WH8804> their prayer <WH8605>.
This shall be written <WH3789> <WH8735> for the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314>: and the people <WH5971> which shall be created <WH1254> <WH8737> shall praise <WH1984> <WH8762> the YY <WH3050>.
For he hath looked down <WH8259> <WH8689> from the height <WH4791> of his sanctuary <WH6944>; from heaven <WH8064> did the YY <WH3068> behold <WH5027> <WH8689> the earth <WH776>;
To hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the groaning <WH603> of the prisoner <WH615>; to loose <WH6605> <WH8763> those that are appointed <WH1121> to death <WH8546>;
To declare <WH5608> <WH8763> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> in TZiyon <WH6726>, and his praise <WH8416> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>;
When the people <WH5971> are gathered <WH6908> <WH8736> together <WH3162>, and the kingdoms <WH4467>, to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>.
He weakened <WH6031> <WH8765> my strength <WH3581> in the way <WH1870>; he shortened <WH7114> <WH8765> my days <WH3117>.
I said <WH559> <WH8799>, O my 'Elohim <WH410>, take me not away <WH5927> <WH8686> in the midst <WH2677> of my days <WH3117>: thy years <WH8141> are throughout all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
Of old <WH6440> hast thou laid the foundation <WH3245> <WH8804> of the earth <WH776>: and the heavens <WH8064> are the work <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>.

They shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>, but thou shalt endure <WH5975> <WH8799>: yea, all of them shall wax old <WH1086> <WH8799> like a garment <WH899>; as a vesture <WH3830> shalt thou change <WH2498> <WH8686> them, and they shall be changed <WH2498> <WH8799>:
But thou art the same, and thy years <WH8141> shall have no end <WH8552> <WH8735>.
The children <WH1121> of thy servants <WH5650> shall continue <WH7931> <WH8799>, and their seed <WH2233> shall be established <WH3559> <WH8735> before <WH6440> thee.
